body: @miraluka its unusual to say such thing for me, cause i always as ntr hater try to proove what some story is nasty ntr when anothers think its not, but in this case its really not, maybe they dont fuck before mc came and even if they do thats not ntr, there is equal swinging, yes at the begeining second guy was a little at dominance but now all nice here, mc love this short hair girl and another guy love that brunette and they just swinging, yes earlier girl said what in pure technica/physical aspect 2nd dude can be better but  she loves mc and she feels better having sex with him, and close to end mc passioanetly fucked this girl after second guy and now equal to him even in techique and etc i think, mc proove what now he also cool in sex  to his future gf, about last page, its meant nothing, looks like just some funny moment by their reaction, girl still love mc as person and man the most so this not ntr with stealing, corrupting and other shit, hot and even sweet story, 8,5/10
